name: Forgotten (itch) (Ysere)
description:
Lynette visits her old home after many years and uncovers something she might not should have. Please start from her bedroom on the second floor to have a clearer flow of the plot. 

Our first ever game AND game jam together! The game isn't as finished as we'd like it to be since we ran out of time, but we are super happy and proud of ourselves with what we've created. 

You can contact us on Discord! 

Sam – Ysere#6403 

Yanna – yannastarr#6418
